sentences.sContent: There was an infant squalling in the back of the church.
sentences.sCn: 教堂的后面有个婴儿大声啼哭的声音。

synos.tran: 暴风；麻烦；高声哭喊；尖叫

words.tran: 多风波的；多狂风的；天气愈变愈坏的；可怕的

trans.tranOther: If a person or animal squalls, they make a loud unpleasant noise like the noise made by a crying baby

trans.tranCn: 暴风；麻烦；高声哭喊；尖叫
trans.tranOther: a shrill or noisy yell or howl
